Today in the Hebrides, it's looking solid with 4 ft @ 11s NW swell and light 3 mph ENE winds. Best spots include Tolsta and Port of Ness, both offering clean conditions throughout the day. Tomorrow, the swell picks up to 5 ft @ 12s NNE with light 5 mph ESE winds, making it another great day for surfing at the same spots. On the day after, expect 4 ft @ 9s NNW swell but with fresh 20 mph W winds, leading to blown-out conditions. Best: tomorrow.
